author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Codexis Q4 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.06
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Codexis Inc:
* CODEXIS REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.06
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.02 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.05 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $60 MILLION TO $63 MILLION * ‍TOTAL REVENUES FOR Q4 OF 2017 INCREASED 118% TO $21.7 MILLION FROM $10.0 MILLION FOR Q4 OF 2016​
* SEES ‍ 2018 PRODUCT SALES ARE EXPECTED TO BE $25 MILLION TO $28 MILLION​
* SEES ‍2018 GROSS MARGIN ON PRODUCT SALES IS EXPECTED TO BE 45% TO 48%​
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $68.6 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $23.0 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
